img_text: wNowThis TH2h ago NSW, AUSTRALIA Source: 88c, NSW Police Arrow Strikes Man's Phone, Potentially Saving His Life A phone might have saved a man's life after someone shot at him with an arrow. Police said the individual was holding the phone when another man confronted him with the weapon. When he tried to take a picture, the other man shot the arrow at him, striking the phone, which in turn hit him in the face and left a small cut. The man who shot the arrow was arrested.
